channel.title: Portals
channel.description: hey guys can someone help me with setting lvl req on portals i forgot how to do that :P

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

else if (playercombat <= 45 { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }else{ SendMessage("This cave is for players 45 combat and below only."); }

Just find a portal in your client.java, replace\make a new one with a dif portal id and put something similar to this. This is just an example of my BH cave, 1 of the 3 o.O. The <=45 means 45 or lower can get in and the }else} means that 46 and higher canâ€™t get in. Change it however you want

Read full topic
